title: Dershowitz on Defense of Donald Trump at Impeachment
itunes:title: Dershowitz on Defense of Donald Trump at Impeachment
description:
Alan Dershowitz, Professor Emeritus at Harvard Law School, discusses his upcoming constitutional defense of President Donald Trump at his Senate Impeachment trial. He speaks to host June Grasso.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
